title: Why AI Hive Minds Will Be Needed To Attain AGI
description: How will we attain artificial general intelligence (AGI)? One theory is that we will need to use AGI to train other AGI. This is a hive mind or AGI ecosystem approach.
content: In today’s column, I address an ongoing and acrimonious debate regarding attaining artificial general intelligence (AGI). Here’s the deal. Some ardently believe that we will only arrive at AGI if we have AI training other AI. The idea is that we woul... [8143 chars]

title: From problem statements to prototypes: How real AI gets built at a gen AI hackathon
description: Real artificial intelligence innovation does not begin with abstract ideas or speculative demos. It begins with clearly defined and real-world problems. This article explores why structured problem statements are the foundation of meaningful AI development, how they guide builders from concept to prototype, and why hackathons grounded in real use cases are becoming the most credible platforms for applied GenAI innovation. The piece concludes with a call to action for builders who want to solve problems that matter.
content:
